item.title: Paramount Leadership Team Takes Shape With Execs From RedBird, NBCU
item.description: The new owners of Paramount are putting their leadership team in place in advance of the closing of the Skydance merger on Aug. 7. Andy Gordon, who leads the West Coast office of RedBird Capital Partn
